Package com.database.operations.service

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
com.database.operations.service.DatabaseService
@Service
public class DatabaseService
extends java.lang.Object
the Database service will fetch the required table column metadata

  • Method Details

    • fetchColumnInfo

      public java.util.List<ColumnDetails> fetchColumnInfo​(java.lang.String tableName)
      establishes a connection to the database and fetches the metadata from the database
      Parameters:
      tableName - contains sheetName/tableName
      Returns:
      column metadata which is present in database

    • getColumnInfo

      private java.util.List<ColumnDetails> getColumnInfo​(java.sql.DatabaseMetaData databaseMetaData, java.lang.String tableName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      stores the metadata in the column details
      Parameters:
      databaseMetaData - database metadata instance
      tableName - current table and sheet name
      Returns:
      column metadata which is present in database
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if Column metadata cannot be read

    • readColumnInfo

      private ColumnDetails readColumnInfo​(java.sql.ResultSet column) throws java.sql.SQLException
      reads all the specifications of each column and stores in a map of type ColumnDetails
      Parameters:
      column - resultSet of all column details which is present in database
      Returns:
      ColumnDetails map
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if in appropriate data will be fetch

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword​(java.lang.String password)
      set the password for database
      Parameters:
      password - string of database password
